post.body: Hey there! Any luck with the video?
What isn't good for quilting--the treadle?
When I grow up :) I may buy a Pfaff
I've heard great things about Berninas. I've heard even greater things about Pfaffs. I own a Husq Viking Interlude--computerized.
I have done quilting, but only on a longarm quilter. One of my LQS has a longarm rental service! How cool is that?
What's the app that shows you who you're following, that is following you?
@charlesharper CH, DH, plz help with the tree, so it doesn't look like a physical therapy project.
@charlesharper Did you hear that, dear? Come help figure out the Leaning Tower of Christmas Tree Pisa
We don't play it too often, but we love our Wii!
I know so little about Etsy. There is an Etsy kids? But it is for selling kids stuff, and not for kids who sell? Ugh.
Hey! A fellow Chicagoan! Well, I am no longer living there, but I was born and raised there, and lived there for a long time!
@DaleAnnePotter Sounds like I need to Stumble!
Sounds like DH gave DD just the right encouragement.
It will consume me if I do!
Now, see, THAT is why I refuse to do a lot on this phone (tweeting, Internet, email, etc). It will consume if I do!
BTW the tree fiasco is NOT going well. It stands like the Leaning Tower of Pisa, and as yet 2 sections are still unlit. Ugh.
Older DD is making cookies, after all. Unusual; usually the younger DD bakes. I like the switch.
@DigitalDoodles I can't do it either
Too bad u didn't like the restaurant too much. So, did u write some before going to bed?
Who? Who's looking for video transcription? How much $$$?
Wow; makeup? No way!
Enjoy!
You are SO disciplined; you are my hero. I should be writing now, too.
We are ALWAYS open for sew dates--all three of us!
Our pleasure! DDs luv spending time with her! The Sewin' Sisters just ate her up, they too loved her!
Welcome 2 Twitter! I have been a supporter of your Trivium method 4 years; how'd u know 2 Tweet me? The Lord, of course. :)
But Amazon should have reusable groc bags, though.
My fav green gift is tote bags that are reusable and go to the grocery store. Nuts; if I had my Etsy shop up, I'd offer u some!
Oh! Well if she's interested & if we ever get ourselves together over here :) she can come with us! We'll leave n maybe 30-45
King Vitamin was 'da bomb! It was most likely a knockoff of Capn Crunch, but it was not as sweet as CC.
BTW have you figured out the #oneword thing?
Hey there! I currently do not have other links on my site, but I want to :) so I will get your link up soon. Thanks!
Good heavens! It looks like a $600 Dora to me! Gracious; does she cook and do the laundry, too?
Well, Obama NEVER misled any of us into thinking that he is conservative! (P.S. I am conservative)
Just went there, but couldn't find it. But congrats!!!
Trying to make the transition from IE to Mozilla Firefox. IE crashed all the time.
Great Scot! I've been tweeting for far too long! Much to do, and miles before I sleep. Later!
10-yr-old DD sewed tote bags and aprons to sell! Gosh, guess I gotta open an Etsy shop, huh?
Night, Tweeples!
Why aren't my Adsense and Amazon links "clickable" while I browse in Firefox? Argh!!! Suggestions, please.
